datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to painting, sculpture, and visual arts.

columns.name: exhibition_size
columns.description: Number of visitors at the largest exhibition where the artist has displayed their work.

columns.name: participates_in_international_exhibitions
columns.description: Indicates if the artist participates in international exhibitions

columns.name: education_in_modern_art
columns.description: Indicates if the artist has formal education in modern art

columns.name: art_style_diversity
columns.description: The number of different art styles the artist has worked in

columns.name: well_known_collaborators
columns.description: Number of collaborations with artists who are recognized worldwide

columns.name: local_exhibitions_count
columns.description: Number of exhibitions the artist has held in local galleries

columns.name: solo_exhibitions_count
columns.description: Number of solo exhibitions held by the artist

columns.name: surrealism_preference
columns.description: Indicates artist's preference for surrealism themes based on the medium used

columns.name: international_exhibitions
columns.description: Number of international exhibitions the artist has participated in

columns.name: outdoor_festival_count
columns.description: Number of outdoor festivals in which the artist has participated

columns.name: awards_count
columns.description: Total number of prestigious awards won by the artist

columns.name: primarily_creates_digital_art
columns.description: Indicates if the artist mainly creates digital art

columns.name: popularity_score
columns.description: Score on a scale from 1 to 10 based on fan following and critic reviews

columns.name: international_audience
columns.description: Percentage of the artist’s social media followers who are from outside the artist’s home country

columns.name: international_exhibitions_count
columns.description: The number of international exhibitions an artist has participated in

columns.name: year_first_artwork
columns.description: Year when the artist created their first artwork

columns.name: years_of_experience
columns.description: Number of years the artist has been active

columns.name: number_of_online_followers
columns.description: Total number of followers the artist has on online social platforms

columns.name: focuses_on_contemporary_art
columns.description: Whether the artist primarily focuses on contemporary art

columns.name: theme_surrealism
columns.description: Number of surrealism themed artworks

columns.name: art_discussions_engaged
columns.description: Number of discussions engaged about art topics in the last year

columns.name: peer_recognition_score
columns.description: Score representing recognition from other artists in the community

columns.name: primary_material
columns.description: Primary material used by the artist for creating artworks

columns.name: gallery_representation
columns.description: Indicates whether the artist is represented by one or more art galleries

columns.name: percentage_sold
columns.description: Percentage of the artist's total artworks that have been sold

columns.name: art_exhibits_attended
columns.description: Number of art exhibits the artist has attended

columns.name: techniques_mastered
columns.description: Number of different art techniques the artist has mastered

columns.name: abstract_art_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of abstract themed artworks to total artworks

columns.name: featured_in_top_magazines
columns.description: Indicates if the artist has been featured in top art magazines

columns.name: art_in_public_spaces
columns.description: Indicates if the artist's work has been featured in public spaces

columns.name: mixed_media_usage
columns.description: Indicates if the artist uses mixed media in their artwork

columns.name: theme_landscape
columns.description: Number of landscape themed artworks

columns.name: positive_reviews_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of positive reviews received for the artist's work

columns.name: media_appearances_count
columns.description: Number of times the artist has appeared in media related to visual arts

columns.name: media_coverage
columns.description: The level of media coverage the artist has received, rated from low to high

columns.name: collaborative_projects_count
columns.description: Number of collaborative art projects the artist has participated in

columns.name: participation_in_international_exhibitions
columns.description: Whether the artist has participated in international exhibitions

columns.name: number_of_awards
columns.description: The total number of awards received by the artist

columns.name: gallery_prestige_level
columns.description: Score representing how prestigious the galleries are that have acquired the artist's works

columns.name: countries_artworks_sold
columns.description: Number of different countries where the artist has sold their artworks

columns.name: education_level
columns.description: Highest level of education in fine arts achieved by the artist

columns.name: social_media_following
columns.description: Number of followers the artist has on major social media platforms.

columns.name: collaboration_score
columns.description: Quantitative score based on the number and quality of collaborations with other painters

columns.name: gallery_exhibitions_count
columns.description: Total number of exhibitions held in galleries worldwide

columns.name: social_media_followers
columns.description: Number of followers the artist has on major social media platforms combined

columns.name: specialization
columns.description: The primary artistic specialization of the artist

columns.name: international_awards_prediction
columns.description: Prediction related to international awards

columns.name: art_pieces_sold_per_year
columns.description: The average number of art pieces sold by the artist per year

columns.name: total_artworks
columns.description: Total artworks produced by the artist

columns.name: art_exhibition_visits
columns.description: Number of art exhibitions or galleries visited by the artist in the last year

columns.name: innovative_technique
columns.description: Indicates whether the artist is known for using innovative techniques; 1 for yes, 0 for no

queries.question: What is the relationship between the counts of international exhibitions, local exhibitions, awards, surrealism preference, participation in outdoor festivals, and formal education in modern art among artists in the fine arts domain?
queries.true_hypothesis: Artists who have high counts of international exhibitions and awards, but low counts of local exhibitions, have a stronger preference for surrealism themes compared to artists with lower international exhibition and award counts, even if they participate in outdoor festivals and have formal education in modern art.
